register.acknowledge_text: I acknowledge reading and agreeing to the <1>Terms & Conditions</1> and <3>Privacy Policy</3>, the validity and accuracy of the data entered, and the Ministry's right to process it in a way that serves the public interest and facilitates the provision of investment services.

success.title: Account Created Successfully!
success.message:
Your account has been successfully registered.
You can log in and start using our eServices.

forgot_password.title: Forgot Password
forgot_password.instructions: Please enter the Email address used during your account registration on E-Services to complete your reset password.
forgot_password.success_message: Password reset instructions have been sent to your e-mail address. Please contact customer support if you require additional assistance.

investment_banner.message: You haven't applied for investment registration yet. Complete your registration to begin your investment journey.

apply_for.title: APPLY FOR
apply_for.subtitle: Discover key insights, trends, and opportunities within the sector.

misa.title: MISA Investment Registration
misa.description: Simplifying investment access through MISA registration.
misa.detail_description: To start your investment activity in Saudi Arabia, you must obtain an investment registration. MISA is the authority responsible for providing all services to investors. Investment registration vary according to their requirements.

rhq.title: RHQ Licenses
rhq.description: This license offers streamlined government support.
rhq.detail_description: The RHQ (Regional Headquarters) license enables mulitinational companies to establish a strategic base in Saudi Arabia for managing and supporting their operations across

strategic.title: Strategic Investor Program
strategic.description: Designed for investors who think beyond the short term.
strategic.detail_description: Our Strategic Investor Program is tailored for sophisticated investors seeking long-term growth opportunities. This comprehensive program provides access to exclusive investment vehicles, personalized advisory services, and strategic market insights to help you build a robust investment portfolio.

bidding.title: Bidding Certificate
bidding.description: Start bidding with confidence—get your official certificate
bidding.detail_description: Obtain your official bidding certificate to participate in government and private sector tenders with confidence. Our certification process ensures you meet all regulatory requirements and provides you with the credentials needed to compete in the bidding marketplace effectively.

sector_overview.title: About the sector
sector_overview.subtitle: Discover key insights, trends, and opportunities within the sector.
sector_overview.card_text: The real estate sector is a key pillar of the Kingdom's vision for a vibrant society. With a significant young population and steady demand, Saudi Arabia has taken steps to transform the real estate sector.
